medical_history.chief_complaint: Sudden onset epigastric pain localized to the right lower quadrant (RLQ).
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started yesterday at 14:00, radiated to the RLQ, and is currently localized to the RLQ. Initially rated significantly before coming to the ED, pain improved after administration of IV morphine and other measures. The pain worsened with movement and improved slightly with lying on the right side.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diabetes type II, hypercholesterolemia, hypertension (HTN), cardiomyopathy (EF=50%), chronic kidney disease (baseline creatinine ~2).
